item.title: Driving instructors teach students to dodge danger on Zimbabwe roads
item.description: Zimbabwe’s driving lessons have shifted from test prep to survival

item.title: Bluefin tuna sells for record $3.2 million at year-opening auction at Tokyo fish market
item.description: A 535-pound bluefin tuna sold for a record 510 million yen ($3.2 million) at the first auction of 2026 at Tokyo’s Toyosu fish market

item.title: Founder of Indonesian ride-hailing app Gojek stands trial over Chromebooks procurement
item.description: An Indonesian court has opened the trial of a co-founder of the country's ride-hailing and payments company Gojek
